pr_title: DHFPROD-5811: Hopefully fixing how schemas dbs are cleared in tests

timeline.message:
DHFPROD-5811: Fixing failing tests

The use of newAppServicesDatabaseClient is failing intermittently. Since we don't need to retain any documents, we can use the Manage API to clear the database. 

Modified DeployUserAmpsTest to only run if nightly build has major version of 10. Also added a little unit test to verify that "major" is set if it's a nightly build.

timeline.bodyText:
Should we create our own no-arg/no-return functional interface to avoid confusion related to Runnable being related to threads?
https://stackoverflow.com/a/23958916/4460877
timeline.author: akshaysonvane

replies.bodyText: I'm hoping I can remove this soon - it's just here for now to see if it helps at all. ML app servers shouldn't be unavailable for stretches of time during the test suite run - this is just to see if it helps. Hopefully the real problem can be fixed.
replies.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: I see. If we do need to add this in, I think it would be worthwhile to add a comment explaining that Runnable is only being used as a no-arg/no-return functional interface and does not have anything to do with Threads.
replies.author: akshaysonvane
